issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
Keyboard on "Text Field" page disappears after device has been rotated couple of times.

Steps:
1. Launch KitchenSink.
2. Go to Controls> Text Field> Toolbar.
3. Press "Focus to see keyboard w/toolbar".
4. Click on the toolbar's textfield to activate it.
5. Rotate device fast multiple times (10-17).

Expected results:
Keyboard remains on the screen.

Actual results:
Keyboard disappears.

Note: on iPhone version 4.3.5 keyboard remains on the screen, but during rotation keyboard's toolbar "jumps".
fields.summary: iOS: Keyboard on "TextField" page disappears after device been rotated couple of times
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium Studio SDK, build:2.1.3.v20120925173111
Devices:
iPod iOS6
iPhone 4S iOS6

comments.body:
The same behavior occurs on devices with iOS 4.3.5 and 5.1.1. Removing "qe-ios6" label.
This is not a regression, the bug exists on 2.1.2 as well.

Tested on: 
OS: Mac OS X Lion 10.7.4 
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium SDK, build: 2.1.3.v20120928203111
Devices: iPad 2 gen (4.3.5), iPad 3 gen (5.1.1)

The problem cannot reproduce with release 3.1.0 and 3.0.2

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.2.201302191606
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0
iOS iPad Simulator: 6.1
Closing ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced.
